evidence.text:
DIRECTOR: Just need the first name.
SHELLY: Sorry.
DIRECTOR: How tall are you?
DIRECTOR: Age?
SHELLY: A gentleman never asks a lady... her age-- 36?
SHELLY: Sorry, I’m so nervous! I’ve been in Le Razzle Dazzle for a very long time so this is-- I haven’t auditioned in a while... But it’s exciting!
DIRECTOR: You have an act prepared?
